name: AN0TH3R CiTY
description:
AN0TH3R CiTY takes place in a cyber space reality (Neuromancer comes to mind as another token popular culture reference).  The players assume the role of an avatar belonging to an unknown hacker. The player has to fly around in cyberspace, and collect enough “energy packs” in order to win the game. The back story is that the energy packs actually represent encryption key components which the hacker needs in order to break the encryption of a fire wall set up by a rival mega corporation that is involved in making a genetically modified virus that has the potential to destroy humanity.

Game Objective:

Collect all of the floating crystals while avoiding the enemies flying around. 

Controls:

W - Forward

S - Back

L-Shift - Fly

Space - Shoot

Q - Rotate camera left

E - Rotate camera right

Developed using XNA 4.0 and released in November 2013.

IMPORTANT: 

You need to have the latest .Net 4.0 and XNA 4.0 runtime libraries installed on your system in order to run Enforcer. You can download them from here:

http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=17718

http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=20914
